name: SWEET SATAN
description:
The game "SWEET SATAN". Powered by the Unity 3D engine. This game is a alternative version of "SAD SATAN".

This version is  designed exclusively for Windows, because it was originally designed for mobile phones. 

DEPTH AND VARIETY EXPERIENCE - While the player controlling the character through the endless hallways, images may intermittently display, taking up the entire screen and preventing the player from progressing any further until the image automatically closes a few seconds later. The game features walking down monochromatic corridors while various audio samples are played and looped over each other, the game also depends heavily on distorted or reversed audio.
